mapper.sql: id, b_id, b_name, bill_id, bill_no, order_id, order_no, create_time
mapper.select: select t.id,t.b_id,t.b_name,t.bill_id,t.bill_no,t.order_id,t.order_no,t.create_time from counter_order_info t where 1=1 and t.b_id = #{bId}

select t.order_id,t.order_no, t1.destination_warehouse_code, t4.code_name serviceName from counter_order_info t join order_info t1 on t1.id = t.order_id join offer_info t2 on t2.id = t1.offer_info_id join quotation_template t3 on t3.id = t2.qie join service_group t4 on t4.id = t3.sid where 1=1 and t.b_id = #{bid}
